DataElement.preferredName: Serological Hematology Hepatitis B Virus Core Antibody Test Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to the serological hematology test, the in vitro reactions and properties of immune sera, particularly, the concept refers to the use of such reactions to measure serum titers of antibody against infectious and non-infectious agents (serologic tests), to the clinical correlations of the antibody titer, and to the use of serologic reactions to detect antigens, hepatitis B virus core antibody, an antibody produced by B lymphocytes to the hepatitis B core antigen as part of the immune response to hepatitis B viral infection._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to the in vitro reactions and properties of immune sera, particularly, the concept refers to the use of such reactions to measure serum titers of antibody against infectious and non-infectious agents (serologic tests), to the clinical correlations of the antibody titer, and to the use of serologic reactions to detect antigens.:Hematology; the branch of medicine that deals with the blood and blood-forming organs and the diseases thereof.
